title: Complete Storybook Component Coverage Analysis
description: Finished comprehensive analysis of component coverage for Pomo-Flow productivity tool. Identified 56 total Vue components, 36 existing stories, and 20 missing stories. Coverage rate: 64.3%. Fixed Storybook height issues for canvas components and optimized layout. Ready to proceed with creating missing component stories.

title: Create High-Priority Task Management Component Stories
description: Create Storybook stories for core task management components: TaskList, TaskTable, and TaskRow. These are fundamental components for the productivity tool's core functionality. Stories should include interactive examples, props documentation, and various states (empty, loading, with tasks, etc.).

title: Create Canvas Component Stories
description: Create Storybook stories for missing canvas components: GroupEditModal and InboxTimeFilters. These components are essential for canvas functionality and need comprehensive documentation with interactive examples showing various states and configurations.

title: Create Calendar and Productivity Component Stories
description: Create Storybook stories for calendar and productivity components: CalendarInboxPanel and PerformanceTest. These components are important for productivity features and performance monitoring. Stories should demonstrate various calendar views, performance metrics, and interactive states.

title: Create Utility and Settings Component Stories
description: Create Storybook stories for utility and settings components: BackupSettings, CloudSyncSettings, DataRecoveryCenter, GroupModal, MultiSelectToggle, ProjectFilterDropdown, and other utility components. These components handle configuration, data management, and UI utility functions. Stories should show various configuration states and user interactions.

title: Verify Storybook Component Coverage
description: Verify all newly created Storybook stories are working correctly. Test that all component stories render properly, have correct props documentation, and demonstrate the intended functionality. Check Storybook at localhost:6006 to ensure all 20 missing component stories are now available and functional.
